Attribution of weapons:
    * War Axe: Poleaxe from Free Medieval Weapons
    * Battle Axe: Axe_2h from Free Medieval Weapons
    * Broadsword: Sword from Free Medieval Weapons
    * Longsword: sword_2h from Free Medieval Weapons
    * Dagger: Medieval Dagger
    * Claymore: claymore from Basic Sword Pack
    * Warhammer: SledgeHammer
    * Saber: Realistic Saber
    * Shortsword: broadsword3 from Basic Sword Pack
    * Wakizashi: Wakizashi Short Sword
    * Katana: katana from Basic Sword Pack
    * Daikatana: Free Katana and Scabbard
    * Tanto: Tanto
    * SpikeBall: Spike Ball from Ball Pack

Links:
    * Ball Pack by Youngen Tech:
        https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/ball-pack-446
    * Free Medieval Weapons by Gnarly Potato:
        https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/free-medieval-weapons-72541
    * Medieval Dagger by Cahy Design: 
        https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/medieval-dagger-aaa-pbr-141202
    * Basic Sword Pack by Rereke:
        https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/basic-sword-pack-62096
    * Wakizashi Short Sword by Tanuki Digital: 
        https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/wakizashi-short-sword-144679
    * Sledge Hammer by RRFreelance: 
        https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/tools/sledge-hammer-20498
    * Realistic Saber by Rain GS: 
        https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/realistic-saber-60838
    * Free Katana and Scabbard by Hideout Studio:
        https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/free-katana-and-scabbard-67185
    * Tanto by Black Light Studios:
        https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/tanto-knife-83268
    * Ball Pack by Youngen Tech:
        https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/ball-pack-446
